com.newtouch.lion.admin.web.controller.system.role

类 RoleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.newtouch.lion.web.controller.AbstractController
      • com.newtouch.lion.admin.web.controller.system.role.RoleController

  • @Controller
@RequestMapping(value="/system/role")
public class RoleController
extends AbstractController

    Title: 角色控制器

    Description: 包括角色查询、添加、删除、修改

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2015

    Company: Newtouch

    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    WangLijun
